alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson; McDonough; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:40AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Warren, southeastern Henderson, McDonough and southeastern Hancock Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 739 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sciota to 6 miles west of West Point. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Carthage, Bushnell, Colchester, Blandinsville, Augusta, Bowen, Industry, Good Hope, Bardolph, West Point, Tennessee, Sciota, Western Illinois University, Fandon, New Philadelphia, Colmar, Adair, Plymouth and Denver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
